text: bil klintan amarikawe hitapu janadhipathiwarayeki.

mema waga wyapruthiyata laba di athi wananthara idam jala poshaka pradesha we.eeta amatharawa ema samastha wananthara paddhathiyama ali athunge pradhana wasa bhumiyaki.me athara pura widyathmaka ha jaiwa widyathmaka watinakam rasakda ema pradeshaye weyi.me wana witath ema samagama kala kanimakadi adi 02k pamana usa kirigaruda buddha prathimawak hamuwi thibe.eeta amatharawa ema bhumiyen shailamaya gal aasanayak athulu gal kanu rasakda hamuwa athi bawa sandahan.mema purawidyathmaka ha jaiwawidyathmaka karunu salakillata gena thabbowa abhaya bhumiya ha wirakkulicholeyi wana rakshithaya namin wilpaththuwa jathika wanodyanaye dakunu mayima ha sambandha rakshitha jalayak lesa ema rakshitha bim sandaha nithimaya aarakshawa laba di athi bawayi chamikara mahatha sandahan karanne.

yathuru padi dekakin ohu hambaa giya mara kandayama thawarajata darunu lesa pahara demin tharjanaya kale ath adanguwehi sitina balendra jayakumari nidahas karana lesa illa karannata niyamitha udghoshanaya nathara nokala hoth ohu mara damana bawa ya.manawa himikam kamituwa shi්ra lankawa pilibanda siya wimarshanaya aambha kirimata dedinakata pera nithyanuukula wisa balapatha්rayak athiwa switsarlanthaya bala eemata guwan thotata giya demala kanthawaka wu kajipan sharmila nathara kota keti athadanguwaka randawa gath aanduwa ayata ratin pita wimata awasara dunne natha.

ee wenuwen pasugiya dina kihipayaka sita sanketha wadawarjanayaka nirathawu ema sangamaya ada dinaye maranthika upawasayaka niratha wana bawa ehi sabhapathi gamini koslanda mahatha sa`dahan kaleya. 2015 wasare hi`ga dimana laba ganima sa`daha wasarakata adhika kalayak saukhya amathyanshaya sama`ga sakachcha kirimata sidu wu bawa bawa hethema kiya siti.

mema awasthawata shri lankawe indiyanu mahakomasaris garu tharanjan sing sandhu, kalaniya wishwawidyalaye upakulapathi mahacharya di.em. semasinha, niyojya upakulapathi mahacharya lakshman senawirathna, paryeshana sabhawe adhyaksha winethru mahacharya en.pi sunil chandra, manawa shasthra pitaye pitadhipathi mahacharya pattrik rathnayaka, hindi bhasha adhyayana anshaye anshadhipathi mahacharya upul ranjith hewawithanagamage, indiyanu mahakomasaris karyalaye saha indiyanu sanskruthika madhyasthanaye hindi bhasha adhyayana anshaye aacharyawaru ha widyarthin, hindi bhashawa iganwima sidu karanu labana pasalwala aacharyawaru saha sisu sisuwiyan rasak sahabhagi wuha.
ithin aathin muwa rala mathuwena thuru ohu bala sitiya.

hambanthota waraya wikinima, samagamwalata idam pawarima athulu aanduwe kriyamargawalata erehiwa jawipe aarambha kara athi wirodhathawayan pilibandawa jawipe nayakayo wishesha sakachchawaka niratha wuna.
tharagaya saha jaya sanketha pradanaya eeye paswaruwe (13) pawathwune thrikunamalaya shri koneswara hindu widyaliya kridanganayediyi.
aarya sankhyawela gane.ee bauddha sanniwedanaye mulika haraya, uththarithara paramarthaya sathyaya, aththama janaya wetha idiripath kirimayi.
apa koyi kaleda ostreliyawata aawe, kawadada kanbara aawe yanadi de danaganna ohu unandu una.
